rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0001
rows.name: Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0002
rows.name:
An emergency stop key was implanted in Luxaar and the others,
the created lifeforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0003
rows.name: Prepared in case they, as resilient lifeforms, ran wild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0004
rows.name: That is the body of a Samaarian... of an Earthling[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0005
rows.name:
The genes of Earthlings, passed down continuously,
are the key to stopping the Growth's rampage[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0006
rows.name: That is why Luxaar and the others[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0006_02
rows.name:
They feared the Earthlings regenerated by the Life,
not us [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0007
rows.name: Lao-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0008
rows.name:
This is fine[ST:wide ]—
You did well, you guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0009
rows.name:
With this, humanity's wish will be granted.
The future will continue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0010
rows.name: Don't forget[ST:wide ]— Once we regain our bodies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0011
rows.name: There is no need to fear the Growth anymore[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0012
rows.name: What's the status?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0013
rows.name: Is it still operating?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's safe[ST:wide ]—
We're holding on somehow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Thank goodness[ST:wide ]—
We protected it completely, didn't we![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0016
rows.name: But Lao-san is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0017
rows.name: There is no need to be sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0018
rows.name:
We didn't just protect the system completely.
We saved Lao too[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0019
rows.name: I see[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0020
rows.name:
His memories and genetic information are also
preserved in the Life's cloud data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Yes.
He, too, can be revived in a new body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0022
rows.name:
But that[ST:wide ]—
Will Lao-san be able to accept that[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0023
rows.name: He remembers everything he did, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0024
rows.name:
That's fine.
If you die, you can't make amends or feel regret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0025
rows.name:
We'll have him live and work enough
to match what he did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0026
rows.name: That's right[ST:wide ]— Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Right.
Then hurry and restore the system![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0029
rows.name: Colonel Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0030
rows.name:
There is one thing
I must tell everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0031
rows.name: What is it, all of a sudden?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0032
rows.name: Among the [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby] of NLA, there is just one person...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Whose consciousness is being transferred
from a body sleeping in a cold capsule[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Eh?
I thought the Earth Life Colonization Project didn't carry anyone[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0035
rows.name: Yes, but that one person alone is different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0036
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0037
rows.name: This is what I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0038
rows.name: Colonel Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0039
rows.name: E-Elma-san, did you die-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0040
rows.name: No, this is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0041
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—I am not dead.
I just returned my consciousness to my main body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0042
rows.name: Elma[ST:wide ]— That appearance[ST:wide ]—!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0043
rows.name: Yes, this is my true form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0044
rows.name: The only alien transported in a cold capsule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0045
rows.name:
Colonel Elma[ST:wide ]—
You weren't an Earthling![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0046
rows.name: No way[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0047
rows.name: Ohh, beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Even seeing this form[ST:wide ]—
I wonder if you will think of me as your comrade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0050
rows.name: Isn't that obvious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0051
rows.name:
We believed in Elma-san's actions, not your appearance[ST:wide ]—
And followed you this far![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0052
rows.name: That's right-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0062
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—It is as Lin says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0063
rows.name:
Colonel Elma, you aren't the type of person
who would deceive us without meaning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0064
rows.name: Yeah, I'll believe too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0065
rows.name: Me too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0066
rows.name:
Thank you. I am happy.
[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0067
rows.name:
To answer your trust,
I will tell you the truth as far as I know[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0068
rows.name: But before that, I must do what must be done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0069
rows.name: Something only I can do[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0070
rows.name: With this, it switches to the backup power system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0071
rows.name: Biometric code, confirmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0072
rows.name:
Switch to backup power system
complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0073
rows.name:
Did it really switch over?
It won't suddenly go poof, will it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0074
rows.name: Yes, it's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0075
rows.name: Elma-san, it's Nagi-ojisama.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0076
rows.name: Put him through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0077
rows.name:
I confirmed the recovery of the operation time limit.
Thank you, everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0078
rows.name:
I also received a report from Vandham that
the Growth forces outside have been suppressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0079
rows.name:
I'll have Testament restore the main power system
within a few days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0080
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0081
rows.name:
Good work.
Let's have a celebratory drink when you return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0082
rows.name: With this, our lifespan has been extended for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0083
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0084
rows.name:
If the main power is restored,
the worry of running out of battery will disappear too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0085
rows.name: Once we return to flesh and blood, even that won't be necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0086
rows.name: Yeah, that's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0087
rows.name: For that, first we need to repair the control computer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0088
rows.name:
We also have to check your memories[ST:wide ]—
The database in the lower layer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0089
rows.name: Wait a minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0090
rows.name: Before that, hearing the truth Elma mentioned comes first, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0091
rows.name:
Come to think of it[ST:wide ]—
Too much happened and I completely forgot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0092
rows.name:
Oh well, no need to rush.
We have plenty of time now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0093
rows.name: Besides, it will be a long story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0094
rows.name: How about this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0095
rows.name:
Why don't we return to NLA once and listen
while eating Lin's home cooking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0096
rows.name:
I agree-meh!
Tatsu's stomach is rumbling-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0097
rows.name:
Just so happens there's a plump and fatty ingredient
right there[ST:wide ]— right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0098
rows.name: Meh! Mehmehmeh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0099
rows.name:
Hahahaha.
That's right. Yeah, let's do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0100
rows.name: Then, everyone, let's go home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0101
rows.name:
Yes.
Let's return...to our city[ST:wide ]— To NLA.[ST:wait ]
